name: braunschweiger
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a type of sausage made from pork liver (= a large organ in a pig's body) that has been preserved using smoke from burning wood: One of my favourite snacks is a braunschweiger sandwich with lots of mustard.
More examplesFewer examplesBraunschweiger sausage is a type of smoked liver sausage.Examples of cooked sausages include hot dogs, Braunschweiger, and liver sausage. I cut a slice of fresh bread, spread some braunschweiger on it, and barely stopped to take this photo before consuming.
